Moves the actor up by 48 map units or just below the ceiling (whichever is less). Also initializes spec..."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_WraithInit'''
(''no parameter'')
Moves the actor up by 48 map units or just below the ceiling (whichever is less). Also initializes special1 to 0. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Wraith}} and derived classes.
